item.text: Iâ€™ll do a minimal read-only check (`git status` + branch) inside this repo and return a single-line status.

item.command: /bin/zsh -lc 'branch=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null); changes=$(git status --porcelain | wc -l | tr -d '"' '); if [ \""'$changes" = "0" ]; then state=clean; else state="dirty(${changes} changes)"; fi; echo "repo=mem0 branch=${branch} worktree=${state}"'

/bin/zsh -lc 'branch=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null); changes=$(git status --porcelain | wc -l | tr -d '"' '); if [ \""'$changes" = "0" ]; then state=clean; else state="dirty(${changes} changes)"; fi; echo "repo=mem0 branch=${branch} worktree=${state}"'
